meanings.sent1: She inarguably aced the test with a perfect score.
meanings.sent2: The team inarguably won the championship after a flawless season.
meanings.sent3: His love for ice cream is inarguably unmatched by anyone else.
meanings.sent4: The impact of the pandemic on small businesses is inarguably devastating.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset over the ocean was inarguably breathtaking.
